game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient civilization.

task.description: Seek out the old librarian in the Great Library of Antiquities to obtain a secret treasure map.
Find a skilled cartographer in the Port City who can help you decipher the ancient symbols on the treasure map.
Make your way through the dangerous jungle filled with deadly creatures and hidden traps to reach the hidden treasure cave.
Explore the ancient cave and locate the long-lost treasure of the civilization.
